body_html: Can't wait so I implemented it in tensorpack's BatchNorm layer (http://tensorpack.readthedocs.io/modules/models.html#tensorpack.models.BatchNorm) as a simple option. It worked well on my mask-rcnn implementation. This would require #20360 to be merged first, though.

body: Can't wait so I implemented it in tensorpack's BatchNorm layer (http://tensorpack.readthedocs.io/modules/models.html#tensorpack.models.BatchNorm) as a simple option. It worked well on my mask-rcnn implementation. This would require #20360 to be merged first, though.
